name: The Fool
upright: Beginnings, innocence, leap of faith, spontaneity, free spirit.
reversed: Recklessness, naivete, poor judgment, hesitation, folly.

name: The Magician
upright: Willpower, manifestation, skill, resourcefulness, focused action.
reversed: Manipulation, trickery, unused potential, scattered energy.

name: The High Priestess
upright: Intuition, mystery, inner knowing, sacred silence, the subconscious.
reversed: Secrets, withdrawal, hidden motives, disconnect from intuition.

name: The Empress
upright: Fertility, abundance, nurturing, beauty, creativity.
reversed: Dependence, smothering, creative block, neglected self-care.

name: The Emperor
upright: Authority, structure, stability, leadership, discipline.
reversed: Rigidity, domination, inflexibility, power struggles.

name: The Hierophant
upright: Tradition, spiritual guidance, conformity, teachings, institutions.
reversed: Rebellion, unconventional beliefs, personal truth, nonconformity.

name: The Lovers
upright: Union, choice, harmony, attraction, values alignment.
reversed: Disharmony, misalignment, temptation, difficult choices.

name: The Chariot
upright: Determination, control, victory, willpower, direction.
reversed: Lack of control, aggression, scattered aim, stalled progress.

name: Strength
upright: Courage, inner strength, compassion, resilience, quiet power.
reversed: Self-doubt, insecurity, raw emotion, lack of confidence.

name: The Hermit
upright: Soul-searching, wisdom, solitude, guidance, introspection.
reversed: Isolation, withdrawal, loneliness, refusal to look within.

name: Wheel of Fortune
upright: Cycles, fate, change, luck, turning point.
reversed: Resistance to change, setbacks, external forces, bad timing.

name: Justice
upright: Fairness, truth, balance, accountability, cause and effect.
reversed: Injustice, bias, dishonesty, imbalance, avoidance of truth.

name: The Hanged Man
upright: Surrender, new perspective, pause, letting go, sacrifice.
reversed: Stagnation, martyrdom, indecision, missed insight.

name: Death
upright: Endings, transformation, release, transition, renewal.
reversed: Resistance to change, fear of endings, clinging to the old.

name: Temperance
upright: Balance, patience, moderation, harmony, healing.
reversed: Excess, imbalance, impatience, lack of vision.

name: The Devil
upright: Bondage, materialism, shadow, temptation, attachment.
reversed: Release, liberation, reclaiming power, detachment.

name: The Tower
upright: Upheaval, sudden change, revelation, breakdown, awakening.
reversed: Fear of change, averting disaster, delayed catastrophe.

name: The Star
upright: Hope, inspiration, renewal, serenity, guidance.
reversed: Doubt, disconnection, lack of faith, pessimism.

name: The Moon
upright: Illusion, intuition, dreams, uncertainty, the unknown.
reversed: Clarity emerging, releasing fear, unveiling deception.

name: The Sun
upright: Joy, success, vitality, positivity, enlightenment.
reversed: Temporary gloom, inflated ego, delays to success.

name: Judgment
upright: Awakening, reckoning, rebirth, inner calling, evaluation.
reversed: Self-doubt, harsh judgment, ignoring the call, stagnation.

name: The World
upright: Completion, integration, achievement, wholeness, travel.
reversed: Incomplete, delays, lack of closure, loose ends.

name: Ace of Flames
upright: Inspiration, new energy, creative spark, initiative, potential.
reversed: Delays, lack of direction, missed spark, scattered passion.

name: Two of Flames
upright: Planning, future vision, decisions, first steps, potential paths.
reversed: Fear of the unknown, indecision, playing small, hesitation.

name: Three of Flames
upright: Expansion, foresight, progress, exploration, momentum.
reversed: Delays, obstacles, limited outlook, stalled growth.

name: Four of Flames
upright: Celebration, homecoming, community, foundation, harmony.
reversed: Tension at home, instability, canceled celebration, insecurity.

name: Five of Flames
upright: Competition, conflict, rivalry, testing, friction.
reversed: Avoiding conflict, inner tension, resolution, compromise.

name: Six of Flames
upright: Victory, recognition, success, acclaim, progress.
reversed: Fall from favor, pride, hollow victory, lack of support.

name: Seven of Flames
upright: Defense, perseverance, standing ground, challenge.
reversed: Exhaustion, overwhelm, giving up ground, compromise.

name: Eight of Flames
upright: Swift movement, messages, rapid progress, alignment.
reversed: Delays, frustration, miscommunication, scatter.

name: Nine of Flames
upright: Resilience, persistence, last defense, caution, stamina.
reversed: Fatigue, defensiveness, paranoia, refusing help.

name: Ten of Flames

name: Page of Flames
upright: Enthusiasm, fresh ideas, spark of passion, discovery.

name: Knight of Flames
upright: Action, adventure, bold pursuit, charisma, momentum.
reversed: Impulsiveness, recklessness, scattered energy, delays.

name: Queen of Flames
upright: Confidence, warmth, leadership, creativity, influence.
reversed: Jealousy, demanding nature, domineering, burnout.

name: King of Flames
upright: Vision, authority, enterprise, mastery, inspiration.
reversed: Tyranny, impulsive rule, ruthlessness, cold ambition.

name: Ace of Tides

name: Two of Tides
upright: Partnership, attraction, harmony, reconciliation, union.

name: Five of Tides

name: Six of Tides
upright: Nostalgia, innocence, kindness, reunion, simple joys.

name: Seven of Tides
upright: Choices, fantasies, temptation, wishful thinking, illusion.
reversed: Clarity, realism, decisive choice, prioritized focus.

name: Eight of Tides
upright: Departure, withdrawal, seeking meaning, letting go.
reversed: Aimless drifting, fear of change, stuck emotions.

name: Nine of Tides
upright: Satisfaction, contentment, wish fulfilled, comfort, pleasure.
reversed: Overindulgence, smugness, dissatisfaction, hollow pleasure.

name: Ten of Tides
upright: Emotional fulfillment, family harmony, lasting happiness.
reversed: Discord, strained ties, broken peace, fleeting joy.

name: Page of Tides
upright: Sensitivity, messages of love, curiosity, artistic mood.
reversed: Emotional immaturity, insecurity, moodiness, blocked intuition.

name: Knight of Tides
upright: Romance, pursuit of the heart, idealism, arrival of offers.

name: Queen of Tides
upright: Compassion, intuition, emotional depth, empathy, care.
reversed: Overemotional, codependency, poor boundaries, smothering.

name: King of Tides
upright: Emotional balance, wisdom, diplomacy, calm leadership.
reversed: Coldness, manipulation, mood control, emotional distance.

name: King of Stones
upright: Security, abundance, grounded leadership, enterprise.
